details: Ran all individual tests from WebSocket multiple connections test suite to verify behavior
Discovered that 5 out of 6 tests pass when run in isolation
Identified that test_parallel_connections hangs during tearDown phase
Documented common patterns and implications for test suite integration
Provided specific recommendations for addressing test suite integration issues
Updated Memory Bank files to reflect findings and next steps
Marked WebSocket test suite integration issues analysis as completed
